Class Triangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • MyShapes
      • Triangle
  • public class Triangle
extends MyShapes
    Rectangle has set of x coordinates and y coordinates of triangle's vertex as integer tables (rect[0] = x , rect[1] = y) and color
